thread.title: ‘Super Mario Odyssey’ Gets the ‘Grand Theft Auto’ Treatment
thread.title_full: ‘Super Mario Odyssey’ Gets the ‘Grand Theft Auto’ Treatment

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: ‘Super Mario Odyssey’ Gets the ‘Grand Theft Auto’ Treatment
text:
In Super Mario Odyssey ‘s reveal trailer, you will notice that Mario has been awarded with quite the acrobatic abilities, as he is capable of swinging from light posts and leaping from building to building. But what if the famed video game character wasn’t so skilled and actually had more realistic, human-like movements?
Well, thanks to YouTuber CrowbCat we can get a taste of just that, as in this entertaining new clip we find Mario being transported into the gruesome world of Grand Theft Auto , but he doesn’t have the capabilities to maneuver with such ease this time around. Instead, we find Mario battling with gravity, landing on his head, getting hit by cars, and falling off buildings. Oh, and let’s not forget, he also pays a visit to the strip club.
Press play above to see Mario getting straight worked.
